function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through mass media data","Impact":"Increased risk of misinformation and panic among the public","Mitigation":"Implement strict fact-checking and verification processes for mass media data","Technologies":"Natural Language Processing (NLP) algorithms for analyzing and verifying text data","People":"General public, media organizations","Owner":"Media organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Inaccurate topic modeling leading to misinterpretation of information","Impact":"Misguided insights and decisions based on faulty topic modeling","Mitigation":"Employ expert validation and continuous refinement of topic modeling algorithms","Technologies":"NLP algorithms, machine learning techniques for topic modeling","People":"Researchers, analysts, decision-makers","Owner":"Research institutions, data science teams"},{"Description":"NMF algorithm not effectively capturing key topics in text data","Impact":"Loss of important information and insights from the text data","Mitigation":"Thorough validation of NMF results with domain experts and manual review of generated topics","Technologies":"NLP algorithms, domain-specific knowledge for validation","People":"Researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, data science teams"}]}
